name: opposite platformer
description:
A game for the great "Dumb jam". 

A  platformer game based on the theme opposite.

CONTROLS

D and arrow key right to move left.

A and arrow key left to move right.

SPACE BAR to jump,

You know how platformer games work :)

!<DISCLAIMER>!

I don't know  why when you collide with  the enemy the game freezes please let me know it you  also experience this issue or it's all good in your machine, until then just don't collide with the enemy

Thank You for taking your time and playing the game

Have a nice day!
